summary: WHILE DRIVING APPROXIMATELY 25 MPH, THE VEHICLE EXPERIENCED A LOSS OF POWER STEERING. THE SERVICE POWER STEERING, 4 WHEEL DRIVE, AND CHECK ENGINE WARNING INDICATORS ILLUMINATED. IN ADDITION, THE STEERING WHEEL REQUIRED EXCESSIVE FORCE TO TURN. THE VEHICLE WAS DRIVEN BACK TO THE CONTACT'S RESIDENCE AND THEN TOWED TO THE DEALER WHERE IT WAS DIAGNOSED THAT THE STEERING GEAR MODULE NEEDED TO BE REPLACED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOTIFIED OF THE FAILURE, BUT DID NOT OFFER ANY ASSISTANCE. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS APPROXIMATELY 50,125.
